analyzed: khīṇā hi mayham jāti  vusitam jina sāsana
translated: Birth is destroyed for me,🔽the Jina’s instruction has been fulfilled;
The net of doubt has been removed,
the cause of becoming has been destroyed.
The purpose for which I went forth
from the home to the homeless life,
That purpose has been reached by me,
the destruction of all the fetters.
